data.meta_description: Platinum Equity, LLC is a Beverly Hills, CA based company incorporated on January 1, 2023. Discover contact details, principal and mailing addresses, incorporation details, filing and reporting history.
data.text:
Platinum Equity, LLC is a business entity based in Beverly Hills, CA. Established recently on January 1, 2023, this Foreign Limited Liability Company is recognized under the document number 605001270. Governed by the Washington Secretary of State, the company is listed in Active status in state records.

The principal address of the company is located at 360 North Crescent Drive, South Building, Beverly Hills, CA, 90210, United States and mailing address is at C/o Platinum Equity Advisors, Llc, 360 North Crescent Drive, South Building, Beverly Hills, CA, 90210, United States. This address serves as the central hub for the company's activities and communications.

Overseeing the operations and compliance of this Foreign Limited Liability Company is C T Corporation System, who serves as the registered agent. He operates from 711 Capitol Way S Ste 204, Olympia, WA, 98501-1267, United States.

The company made its last annual reports available on January 18, 2024
